mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION (TARGET_MBR_ID, MESSAGE, CHECK_READ, SEND_TIME, PASSING_URL, MESSAGE_CAT) VALUES (#{TARGET_MBR_ID}, #{MESSAGE}, 0, now(), #{PASSING_URL}, #{MESSAGE_CAT})
mapper.select: SELECT TARGET_MBR_ID, MESSAGE, PASSING_URL, MESSAGE_CAT FROM NOTIFICATION left join BAND_PRPT_INFO ON BAND_PRPT_INFO.MBR_ID = NOTIFICATION.TARGET_MBR_ID WHERE TARGET_MBR_ID = #{userId} AND CHECK_READ = 0
